name: PietWar
description:
PietWar is a simple top-down shooter game inspired by Piet Mondrian, where 3 teams fight each other and try to capture and control the most territory in fast-paced 30 seconds battles !

The game doesn't feature online play, but should work without issue with cloud gaming software such as Parsec.

It was made in 2 months for a school project.

Controls

Mouse : Move with the WASD/ZQSD keys, aim with the mouse and shoot with left click.

Controller : Move with the left stick, aim with the right stick and shoot with the right back trigger (R2/RT/ZR)

Credits
